usefulItems: fine mesh sieve, 4 small serving glasses
title: Spiced almond eggnog

ingredients.content: ¼ tsp ground nutmeg, plus extra to serve
½ tsp ground cinnamon, plus extra to serve

preparations.content: Place egg yolks, eggs and honey into mixing bowl and mix <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>. Add almond milk, milk and vanilla and cook <b>10 min/70°C/speed 2<b>.

Add cornflour. Using a fine-mesh sieve, sift nutmeg and cinnamon into mixing bowl and cook <b>14 min/70°C/speed 2<b>, until slightly thickened. Blend <b>20 sec/speed 4<b> or until frothy. <b>Remove butterfly whisk<b>.
Strain eggnog through fine-mesh sieve into serving glasses. Dust with extra nutmeg and cinnamon before serving.

hintsAndTricks: If you’re making this eggnog for a special occasion, you can add 1-2 tbsp brandy or dark rum when adding spices.
<b>Dairy-free eggnog:<b> Replace the cow’s milk and use 800 g almond milk.
